solution.text:
Given pair of equations are:
_{i}_x + y = _{{3*i}}_ ------(1)
And x - _{{i+1}}_y = _{{4*i}}_ --------(2)
Comparing with general pair of equations
We get,
i.e., \(a_1 = _{i}_ , a_2 = 1 , b_1 = 1 , b_2 = -_{{i+1}}_ , c_1 = -_{{3*i}}_ and c_2 = -_{{4*i}}_\)
Here,
\({_{i}_\over 1} \neq {1\over -_{{i+1}}_} , {a_1\over a_2} \neq {b_1\over b_2}\)
Therefore pair of linear equations are consistent

content.text:
Find out whether the following pairs of linear equations are consistent, or inconsistent.
_{i}_x + y = _{{3*i}}_ and x - _{{i+1}}_y = _{{4*i}}_
